img_summary: The image depicts the **Arhat Gold Piece**, a legendary item in *Black Myth: Wukong*. This item, described as gold peeled from an Arhat statue's face, is found in **Sandgate Village - Valley of Despair** after defeating the optional boss, the **First Prince of Flowing Sands**. Possessing this item triggers an encounter with the boar man at **Fright Cliff - Rockrest Flat** in **Yellow Wind Ridge**, adding a layer of narrative depth and gameplay progression.
